definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
rate of infection (usu. of a disease)

sentences.english: Heavily infected areas will appear thin and chlorotic (yellow to light brown).
sentences.chinese: 嚴重感染的地區會顯得細瘦萎黃。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能夠反覆感染我們的原因在於病毒的不斷變化。

sentences.english: He was laid up for a week by an intestinal bug.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲腸道感染細菌休息了一週。

sentences.english: This report characterizes the cutaneous fungal infection associated with WNS.
sentences.chinese: 本報告的特點皮膚真菌感染與WNS系列。

sentences.english: These vaccines protect you from getting infected with mumps.
sentences.chinese: 這些疫苗能夠保護你免受腮腺炎感染。

sentences.english: Mr Yettaw, who has been ill since his arrest in Burma, wore the mask to guard against infection.
sentences.chinese: 他在緬甸被捕以後，染病戴着口罩是爲了防止感染。

sentences.english: The infection or venom from the bite could kill them.
sentences.chinese: 這一口帶來的感染和毒液就可能殺死我的羊。

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合併弓形蟲感染的可能性。

sentences.english: The infections endocarditis was a major cause of the secondary ruptures group. The repair …
sentences.chinese: 感染性心內膜炎是繼發性瓣膜腱索斷裂的主要原因。

sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 爲了消除腸胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或電解質液體。

sentences.english: Most have to be set to auto-update and protect you from further infection.
sentences.chinese: 最有可自動更新，保護你再感染。

sentences.english: Analysis of risk factors for nosocomial infection of urologic al surgical department.
sentences.chinese: 泌尿外科醫院感染危險因素分析。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical characteristic of alimentary tract hemorrhage caused by ancylostomiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鉤蟲感染導致消化道出血的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: If we don't remove the tooth, the 2)gum may get infected.
sentences.chinese: 如果不拔，牙齦有可能遭受感染。

sentences.english: An expressing vector of major outer-membrane protein of Chlamydia psittaci was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 主要外膜蛋白在鸚鵡熱衣原體感染過程中起主要作用。

sentences.english: “If there's a real hash, the client can get infections,” says Kingsley.
sentences.chinese: “如果處理失當，客戶可能會感染，”金斯利說。

definition: HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
